description: Additionally, I am leading the development of re-usable micro-frontends used in multiple Amazon software packages by multiple development teams. These are created and connected through Webpack's Federated Modules. Each implementation uses React lazy-loading, and the latest versions use custom web components and custom events to communicate with the host application.

I am currently responsible for the front end design and development on products used by IT Support Engineers (ITSEs) that support all Amazon employees (about 5000 regular users). The main product is a web application that incorporates many tools together for the sake of enabling ITSEs to have an efficient and centralized workflow.
positions.positionSubtitle: IT Support contact resolution software development
